title: Median age of the population in Hong Kong 2015
summary: Overall Median age in years has increased over the Year.
Median age in years is slightly increasing from 2035 to 2040.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2035 and 2040.
The highest Median age in years, of value 51.3 was reached at Year 2040
The lowest Median age in years, of value 49.7 was reported at Year 2035
